name: Figma Slack updates
description: Post updates to Slack from a Figma file's version history

FIGMA_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The Figma Personal Access Token created for your account

FIGMA_FILE_KEY.description: The Figma file key to post updates from

FIGMA_FILE_NAME.description: The Figma file Name to post updates from

SLACK_TEAM_ID.description: The team ID from the Slack Webhook URL

SLACK_USER_ID.description: The user ID from the Slack Webhook URL

SLACK_CHANNEL_ID.description: The channel ID from the Slack Webhook URL
